channel.title: tech on particl3s.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in tech on particl3s.xyz

item.title: Chroma Corps
item.description: Our pal Sinix is hosting Chroma Corps again this year, a world building exercise for a mech academy. All cadets are live ==> https://youtu.be/aH7fZ-iBZqk

item.title: Drawpile
item.description: There’s a new release of Drawpile out as of three days ago, a free collaborative online drawing platform. https://drawpile.net

item.title: Farewell
item.description: After using KDE desktop environment for a few years I have overwrote the OS with Openbox. A messy few days though not a bad breakup, happy Halloween!

item.title: Infinity Wars Classic
item.description: A kickstarter just ended for one of my all time favourite card games. Link is in the post, may the triforce be with you.

item.title: Highway of Information
item.description: The network was down yesterday for a day, really brings life into perspective. People connected to the web 24/7 must have a tough time staying grounded.

item.title: Battery
item.description: Bought a used solar cell, small and portable. Also saw a dead rodent earlier, under a bridge.
